page.title: 09CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content:
Here are some more games that we play at Symondsbury School:
{ Lurkey, Lurkey {Lurkey,Lurkey}is a game where someone is at the post and they count to 50. The others go and hide and then when they have finished counting they come and find you. If they see you they run to the post and say, "Lurkey,Lurkey." If the person is looking for you then you can run to the post and say, "Lurkey,Lurkey home." If you are the last person you say, "Lurkey, Lurkey save all." Then the same person will be on again.
